title: President Rajapaksa presented the Budget Report- 2013 to the parliament
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) President Mahinda Rajapaksa as Minister of Finance presented the Budget Report for the year 2013 in parliament today on 08 November. This is Sri Lanka’s 66th Budget and the 8th Budget presented by President Rajapaksa in his capacity as the Minister of Finance & Planning,…
